meanings.definition: To think about or consider something
meanings.sent1: I bethink my decision before making a choice.
meanings.sent2: She always bethinks carefully before speaking.
meanings.sent3: As I bethink my options, I realize I have many.
meanings.sent4: Let us bethink the consequences of our actions.
meanings.sent5: Bethinking the possibilities, he felt overwhelmed.

meanings.sent1: Every morning, I bethink myself to take my vitamins.
meanings.sent2: He would bethink himself to lock the door before leaving.
meanings.sent3: I often bethink myself too late to turn off the stove.
meanings.sent4: She would bethink herself of the important meeting.
meanings.sent5: Bethinking to grab his keys, he rushed out the door.

meanings.sent1: I bethink the days of my childhood with fondness.
meanings.sent2: They bethink the lessons learned from past mistakes.
meanings.sent3: Bethinking the lyrics, she sang along joyfully.
meanings.sent4: He bethinks the stories his grandfather used to tell.
meanings.sent5: Bethinking the old house, memories flooded back.
